doc.name: ArrayRemoveElement
doc.description: Remove occurrences of a specified element from an array. This actor reads an array from the array input port and an element from the element port-parameter and removes all occurances that match the element from the array. The output may be an empty array, in which case it will have the same type as the input.
doc.author: Efrat Jaeger and Edward A. Lee
doc.port: Input array. The type of this port is at least an array of the type of the element port.
The resulting output array. Note that the output will be a new array with the same type as the input array.
